name: Pillow Fighters
description:
Pillow Fighters, is a game where you have to take out... I mean put some "Bad Guys" to sleep. You play as a blob like character with wacky movement, and have to take out all the enemies without being hit, and in the time frame.

Instructions:

- WASD to move

- Use pillows for murder... I mean good sleep

- By Nocrom Studios 

- Oreo Osborn you know who you are
